Package in.co.rays.Proj4.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataUtility
    Utility class to handle common data conversion operations such as String to int/long/date/timestamp and vice versa.
    DataValidator
    The DataValidator class provides utility methods to validate various types of user input such as null checks, email format, phone number, password rules, and more.
    EmailBuilder
    Utility class to build HTML email messages for user-related actions.
    EmailMessage  
    EmailUtility
    Utility class for sending email messages via SMTP using JavaMail API.
    HTMLUtility
    Utility class to generate HTML `
    JDBCDataSource  
    PropertyReader
    Utility class to read messages or property values from a ResourceBundle, with support for parameter replacement within message templates.
    ServletUtility
    Utility class for common servlet operations such as forwarding, redirecting, managing request attributes (error/success messages, beans, lists), and exception handling.
